attributes.action: take the law into his own hands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last linght I watched Tim Burton's Batman, and I was impressed with Batman's can-do attitude and his ability to get the job done when supervillains attack Gotham City. I suggest Gordon should put on a cape and go around calling himself 'The Caped Crusader'

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
